SELECT Facctid acctid, Fuid uid, Fuserid userid, Facct_type accttype, Fcur_type curtype, Fbalance balance, Ffreeze_balance freeze_balance, Fstate state, Flstate lstate, Fcreate_time create_time, Fmodify_time modify_time, Fsign sign, Fmemo memo FROM ct_db.t_account where Fstate = 1 AND Flstate=1 AND Fuid=#uid# AND Facct_type=#accttype# AND Fcur_type=#curtype#
FOR UPDATE

SELECT Fpkid pkid, Fvoucher voucher, Flistid listid, Freq_no req_no, Fcur_type cur_type, Ftrans_amt trans_amt, Ffrozen_amt frozen_amt, Faction_type action_type, Ftrans_type trans_type, Ffrom_uid from_uid, Ffrom_userid from_userid, Fto_uid to_uid, Fto_userid to_userid, Ftrade_acc_time trade_acc_time, Fcreate_time create_time, Fmodify_time modify_time, Fmemo memo FROM ct_db_$db_idx$.t_trans_voucher_$tb_idx$ where Fvoucher=#voucher#
SELECT Fuid uid, Fspid spid, Fstate state, Fauthflag authflag FROM finance_db.t_sp_info where Fspid=#spid#

SELECT Flistid listid, Fuid uid, Fuserid userid, Fcur_type cur_type, Ffreeze_amt freeze_amt, Frela_list rela_list, Funfreeze_amt unfreeze_amt, Fstate state FROM ct_db_$db_idx$.t_freeze_list_$tb_idx$ where Flistid=#listid# AND Fuid=#uid# AND Fcur_type=#cur_type#
